definition.source: National Center for Textual Resources and Lexicales
definition.text: Character of what is beautiful, of what pleases everyone.

rip.text: Beauty has a hidden side. Beware of it.

look.text: Wait, look a little more closer.

yousee.text: Did you notice anything in particular?

1.name: Direction the museum
1.text: To begin with, go to the museum and enter our exhibition

2.name: Application diktat
2.text: You have 2 choices: you can download the diktat application on your phone, or we'll lend you a tablet.

3.name: Start of the exhibition
3.text: You walk around the exhibition, and you approach a poster.

4.name: Scan a poster
4.text: You scan the poster with the application to discover its secrets. You can walk around looking for hidden elements.

5.name: Discovery and interaction
5.text: Some posters are interactive. Different actions reveal other elements. You can also learn more about diktats.

nitya.bio: Nitya was in charge of the design and production of all the posters for the exhibition.

hugo.bio: Hugo do a part of the development. It is thanks to him that the posters have beautiful texts.

loris.bio: Loris do the poster detection so your phone could say « Oh, a poster ».
